text: Down Among the Sheltering Palms is a 1953 American musical comedy movie directed by Edmund Goulding and starring David Wayne, Mitzi Gaynor, William Lundigan, Jane Greer, Gloria DeHaven. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1953 comedy movies Category:1950s American musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Edmund Goulding Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: Down Among the Sheltering Palms (movie)
